shortDescription: "To map a boolean expression to a bool, a ternary conditional operator is necessary"

The ternary conditional operator is necessary for converting an expression such as `a > b` into a `bool`.

frontmatter.shortDescription: To map a boolean expression to a bool, a ternary conditional operator is necessary
frontmatter.shortCorrection: To map a boolean expression to a bool, one can just use it
